text: Aldair Sanchez (born June 6, 2002), is an American soccer player who plays as a defender for the Portland Timbers academy. ==Club career== After playing with the Portland Timbers academy, Sanchez appeared as an 80th-minute substitute for Portland's USL Championship side Portland Timbers 2 on August 31, 2019 in a 3-1 win over Reno 1868. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:American soccer players Category:Portland Timbers 2 players Category:Soccer players from Washington (state) Category:USL Championship players Category:Sportspeople from Vancouver, Washington
title: Aldair Sanchez
